titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Yellow Ribbon Day in honor of members of the Armed Forces who are serving overseas apart from their families and loved ones.
Supporting the goals and ideals of Yellow Ribbon Day in honor of members of the Armed Forces who are serving overseas apart from their families and loved ones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Supports the goals and ideals of Yellow Ribbon Day in honor of members of the Armed Forces serving overseas apart from their families and loved ones.
